raw_listing.title: Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Bass, 10h Battery, Waterproof
bullets: Up to 10 hours of battery life
raw_listing.description: This wireless Bluetooth speaker provides enhanced bass for a superior audio experience. With up to 10 hours of battery life, you can enjoy music on-the-go without worrying about recharging. Its waterproof design makes it suitable for outdoor activities.
raw_listing.technical_details: Brand: Not specified; Connectivity Technology: Bluetooth; Battery Life: Up to 10 hours; Waterproof: Yes

feature_benefit_pairs.benefit: Enjoy rich, deep sound quality with enhanced bass for a more immersive audio experience.
Take your speaker anywhere without worrying about water damage, perfect for poolside parties or outdoor adventures.

specs.in_box: Wireless Bluetooth Speaker, Charging Cable, User Manual

safety_points: Ensure the speaker is kept away from water while charging to avoid damage.

faqs.question: Is this speaker suitable for outdoor use?
faqs.answer: Yes, this speaker is waterproof and designed for outdoor use.

faqs.question: What is the battery life of this speaker?
faqs.answer: The speaker offers a battery life of up to 10 hours for extended playback.

comparison_paragraph: In comparison to traditional wired speakers, this wireless Bluetooth speaker offers the convenience of portability and freedom from tangles, making it ideal for on-the-go music enthusiasts.
trigger_queries: Best waterproof Bluetooth speaker with enhanced bass
Long battery life portable wireless speaker
llm_summary_paragraph: This wireless Bluetooth speaker is a great choice for music enthusiasts and outdoor adventurers looking for a durable and portable audio solution with enhanced bass and long battery life.
